articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Google is paying the Wikimedia Foundation for better access to information - The Verge
articles.description: Google is becoming one of the Wikimedia Foundation’s first Enterprise customers. The service will give Google more efficient access to large amounts of data from Wikimedia and Wikipedia.
